settings.title: Salon Quality Nails At Home In Minutes!
settings.subtitle: SEMI-CURED GEL NAILS

settings.title: UP TO TWO WEEKS FLAWLESS SHINE
settings.subtitle: Designed to provide a durable finish with a glossy shine that can last up to two weeks. Add a gel top coat for even longer lasting shine!

settings.title: FITS EVERY NAIL
settings.subtitle: Each box contains multiple sizes to accommodate different nail widths and lengths. If a strip is slightly larger than your nail, it can be trimmed with nail scissors or clippers to fit more accurately. If a strip is slightly smaller than your nail, you can stretch it to fit more accurately.

settings.title: CURES IN SECONDS
settings.subtitle: Experience quick and convenient nail care with our Glam Gel Nail nail strips. Cure in just 60-120 seconds under a UV or LED lamp for instant, long-lasting shine and durability.

settings.title: DAMAGE FREE REMOVAL
settings.subtitle: Enjoy damage-free removal with our Glam Gel Nail strips. Designed for using a gentle oil-based removal, our strips ensure a stress-free experience without compromising your natural nail health.

settings.desc: So I put these semi-cured gel nails through the wringer—dishes, dirt, you name it. And guess what? They're still kicking! Seriously impressed with how well they've held up.
I was a bit skeptical at first, but they were easier to apply than I thought. Definitely won’t be going back to the nail salon!
As someone who loves switching up their nail color frequently, these have been a dream come true. Plus, the removal process is a breeze! Highly recommend!
Out of all the at-home semi cured gel nails I've tested, this one takes the cake. They are thin, flexible, and fit perfectly to my nails. I'd rate it 10/10!
I'm OBSESSED with this brand! They lasted me 3 weeks without chipping and maintained its glossy finish.
